name: La Cruz del Tiempo
description: This is a game made in Ecuador and is about how we used to measure time and our calendar in ancient times. We called: La Cruz del Tiempo.  Is based on an investigation that has the same name. Before the Hispanic Conqueer, Andean people  used to built columns to see the shadow´s Sun. With this observation, they had an exactly calendar with 365 days, four seasons, were organiced and their principal celebrations were place by these observations. With this game we want to conserve this practice and promote our own calendar.
